searchParameters.q: Legacy Emanuel Hospital site contact us location

knowledgeGraph.title: Legacy Emanuel Medical Center
knowledgeGraph.description: Legacy Emanuel Medical Center is a hospital located in the Eliot neighborhood of Portland, Oregon, United States. Founded in 1912, it is one of only two Level I trauma centers in the state of Oregon, and home to the only burn center between Seattle and Sacramento.

organic.title: Legacy Emanuel Medical Center
organic.snippet: Legacy Emanuel Medical Center offers 24-7 expertise for critical health conditions. It is a designated Level I trauma center, one of only two in the state.

organic.title: Contact Us | Legacy Health
organic.snippet: Find phone and fax numbers for Legacy hospitals and offices such as billing, medical records requests, employment verification and more.
